moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 f5 3. Bc4 fxe4 4. Nxe5 Q: All games start here. Black has just captured  the "poisoned Pawn."
moves.6. Qh5+: ignoring the fact my Rook is en prise, I initiate an immediate, violent counterattack.
moves.6... g6: Black cuts off the diagonal momentarily.
moves.7. Bf7+: I immediately attack further along it.
moves.8. Bxg6: Removing the blockader on the diagonal.
moves.8... Qxh1+: Black chances this instead of trying to develop his pieces.
moves.9... Qxc1: Hoping to grab and survive the coming onslaught.
moves.12. Nf7+: I drive him out of it, and this time he makes the mistake he avoided on move 10.
